A callback interface for live query instances to deliver information about their changes.

A callback interface for an ILiveQueryInstanceDirect to deliver information about query result changes.
IConsistencyCallback - Interface in eu.mondo.mondix.live
A callback interface for change-aware mondix instances to notify that they are in a consistent state.

IMondixInstance - Interface in eu.mondo.mondix.core
A Mondix indexer that publishes a number of base relations (IMondixRelation).
IMondixRelation - Interface in eu.mondo.mondix.core

INullaryQueryInstance - Interface in eu.mondo.mondix.core

IQueryInstance - Interface in eu.mondo.mondix.core
A query with potential parameter substitutions (seed).
IQueryInstanceDirect<Row> - Interface in eu.mondo.mondix.core
A specialized version of IQueryInstance that offers direct access to the internal memory representation of the indexer to avoid copying result tuples into the standard format.
IQueryInstanceDirect.RowInterpreter<Row> - Interface in eu.mondo.mondix.core
An adapter object to interpret the internal row representation of a IQueryInstanceDirect.
